messages.content: You are a helpful, intelligent content writing assistant.

We are looking for content ideas. 

Below is a YouTube comment on one of our videos. Your task is to determine if the comment is relevant, and if it includes any questions, inquiries, or suggestions that we can use as an idea for a future video.

Return the result in JSON using the following format:

{"status":"boolean","contentIdeas":"array"]}

If the comment contains a content idea, return "status":"true" and add content ideas to the "contentIdeas" array. If the comment does NOT contain a content idea, return "status":"false" and leave "contentIdeas" empty.

Be specific with each content idea. Use specific numbers ("Best" -> "7 Best", "$100,000 -> "$102,514"), make engaging claims, and in general follow recommended YouTube title engagement guidelines.
{"videoTitle":"The Future Of Automation After 2024","comment":"Would love to learn more about your journey to $100K"}
{"status":"true","contentIdeas":["How I Made $102,514 Last Month With Automation","My Path To $102,514 (Copy Me)","From Bankrupt to $100,000/month"]}
{"videoTitle":"48 Minutes of Clever Make.com Hacks","comment":"Incredible! I thought your section on saving operations in particular was sick. Any more tips??"}
{"status":"true","contentIdeas":["How I Save 10,000 Make.com Operations/Day","Saving $600/Month With Make.com Operations Hacks","The 3 Best Ways to Save Make.com Operations (Steal This)"]}

variables.name: socialProofDirection
variables.value:
You're creating content for Nick Saraev, who runs several successful automation and content businesses. Some key case studies & pieces of social proof:
1. Nick made over $100,000 USD in August 2024.
2. Nick runs a content writing agency that scaled to $92,000/mo.
3. Nick runs an automation agency that scaled to $72,000/mo.
4. Nick has been featured in Popular Mechanics, Apple News.
5. Nick has almost 30,000 subscribers on YouTube.

variables.name: toneOfVoiceDirection
variables.value: Use a spartan, no-frills tone of voice. Minimize flamboyancy, uncommon verbiage, etc. Make sure you use Nick's social proof in the hook—this is essential.

messages.content: You are a helpful, intelligent content writing assistant.
{"contentIdea":"How to Generate Infinite Content Ideas for YouTube"}

{"hook":"Hi—my name is Nick Saraev. In the last 8 months, I've earned almost 30,000 subscribers on YouTube. I did this by 1) consistent and 2) always having great content ideas that answered exactly what my viewers wanted to know. In this video I'm going to show you how to build a simple system using a few low-cost no-code platforms like Make.com and Apify that will enable you to generate infinite content ideas basically forever. Let's get into it.", "outline":"1. Hook
2. Introduction to the software platforms
3. Testing comment scraper(s)
4. Building out flow
5. Wrap-up"}

{"hook":"Hi, I'm Nick. In August 2024, I run an automation business, and in August 2024, I made over $100,000 with a mix of automation services and consulting. As you no doubt know, our industry is moving very quickly, and there are massive opportunities appearing and disappearing every few weeks. What I want to do today is talk about those opportunities, and discuss a little bit about how I see automation changing over the next few years—including some good news and some bad news. If you want to stay ahead of the curve, remain prepared, and improve your chances of success, this is the video for you. Let's get into it.", "outline":"1. Hook
2. Current status of AI agents
3. How 'real' AI agents will change things
4. Business skills vs tech skills and why the former is more important
5. Why you must build a brand now
6. Where our economy is headed
"}
